On episode 12 (semifinals), Rountree Jr. stopped Josh Stansbury via strikes at 4:15 of the first round

On episode two (quarterfinals), Rountree Jr. was submitted by Cory Hendricks via rear naked choke at 2:34 of the first round. When Hendricks was injured, Rountree Jr. was brought back for the semifinals
On episode one, Rountree Jr. stopped Muhammed Dereese via strikes in the second round
